oaidtb.boosters
Interface MulticlassExtensibleBooster

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaBoostM1, GentleAdaBoost, RealAdaBoost, AbstractCSB
public interface MulticlassExtensibleBooster

Interface for boosters which can handle binary nominal problems and can be extended to the multiclass case using a "one-per-class" approach.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé

confidenceAndSign

public double confidenceAndSign(weka.core.Instance instance,
                                int classifierIndex)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Return the class predicted (<0 == class 0 and >0 == class 1) and the confidence of this prediction (its absolute value) of the classifier indicated. Similar to Booster.distributionForInstance(instance,classifierIndex).
Parameters:
instance - The instance to be classified
classifierIndex - The classifier's index
Returns:
The class predicted and its confidence.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error happens.
